last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 4
last_episode_to_air.overview: Martin Clunes narrates more tips on how to keep dogs mentally stimulated during lockdown. Cameras follow Bodie, a Jack Russell that helps children with their reading, Summer, the golden retriever with maternal urges toward rescue kittens, and a dog that howls along to a 90s club hit.

name: How To Keep Your Dog Happy At Home
original_name: How To Keep Your Dog Happy At Home
overview: Advice on how to keep your canine companion(s) happy and healthy during the UK's lockdown - a period when many dog owners find themselves spending more time than ever with their pets and opportunities for walkies are limited.
